meanings.definition: The quality or state of being suitable or fitting.
meanings.sent1: The meetness of the shoes was perfect for the occasion.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was chosen for its meetness with the theme of the party.
meanings.sent3: The meetness of the clown costume at the formal event caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The meetness of the puzzle pieces was so satisfying as they clicked together effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The meetness of the key in the lock was a relief after struggling with it for so long.

meanings.definition: The act of coming together or encountering someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The meetness of old friends after years apart was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The meetness of the two cars at the intersection caused a traffic jam.
meanings.sent3: The meetness of the cat and the mouse in the kitchen was a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The meetness of the waves crashing against the shore was a powerful display of nature.
meanings.sent5: The meetness of the hikers on the trail created a sense of camaraderie among strangers.
